text: Olga Klimko (born 7 January 1960) is a Ukrainian equestrian. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet female equestrians Category:Ukrainian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Olympic equestrians of the Unified Team Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Olga Klimko
